named-query.name: User.getByUsername
named-query.query: SELECT u FROM User u WHERE u.username = ?1

named-query.name: Person.countByDeleted
named-query.query: SELECT COUNT(d.id) FROM Person d WHERE d.deleted = ?1

named-query.name: Expertise.countByDeleted
named-query.query: SELECT COUNT(d.id) FROM Expertise d WHERE d.deleted = ?1

named-query.name: Expertise.selectByLastChecked
named-query.query: SELECT d FROM Expertise d WHERE d.deleted = false AND (d.lastCheckedOn IS NULL OR d.lastCheckedOn < ?1) AND d.status != spet.sbwo.data.domain.ExpertiseStatus.FINALIZED ORDER BY d.lastCheckedOn ASC

named-query.name: UserSession.readAllExpiredIds
named-query.query: SELECT u.id FROM UserSession u WHERE u.expiryTime < ?1

named-query.name: Court.readByCode
named-query.query: SELECT d FROM Court d where d.code = ?1

named-query.name: Location.getNotGeocoded
named-query.query: SELECT l FROM Location l WHERE l.geocoded = false AND l.address IS NOT NULL

named-query.name: LocationCountry.getByCode
named-query.query: SELECT u FROM LocationCountry u WHERE u.code = ?1

named-query.name: LocationRegion.getByCountryAndCode
named-query.query: SELECT u FROM LocationRegion u WHERE u.country = ?1 AND u.code = ?2

named-query.name: LocationAdministrativeUnit.getByRegionAndCode
named-query.query: SELECT u FROM LocationAdministrativeUnit u WHERE u.region = ?1 AND u.code = ?2
